After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0082533/","name":"The Howling","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcwZmIyNjAtMWM4Yy00YzE1LTk5YzQtNjVlY2IxNzMwNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908914/","name":"Dee Wallace","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001495/","name":"Patrick Macnee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001102/","name":"Joe Dante"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066648/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024716/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065795/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104707/","name":"Gary Brandner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000626/","name":"John Sayles","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935288/","name":"Terence H. Winkless"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Howling","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2646454297","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE4ZDBjNGItNzFmZS00MTAyLTgwOTctMGYzMjM3YTRkYTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE4ZDBjNGItNzFmZS00MTAyLTgwOTctMGYzMjM3YTRkYTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for The Howling","datePublished":"1981-04-10","description":"After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.","keywords":"werewolf,silver bullet,psychiatrist,forest,female full frontal nudity","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0082533/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ryan-10075","dateCreated":"2019-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Funny Werewolf Flick","reviewBody":"This might be if not my favourite werewolf movie is right up there on a very short list. Joe Dante after scaring audiences in going into the water (much like Steven Spielberg before him) with PIRANHA he was given the chance to direct a werewolf movie. Based on a novel by Gary Brandner, which I have read and I must say the film is (and this is rare) way better than the book. Screenwriter John Sayles (who also has a cameo in this film) was brought in to rewrite a script by Terence H. Winkless. What he did was add wonderful humour, characters and nods to horror that werewolf fans should enjoy.

Dee Wallace plays Karen White, who is a news reporter. Wallace I think does a great job in the role and is really able to effectively play the character she is portraying. She is on the trail of an LA serial killer called Eddie Quist (super creepy and dark portrayal by Robert Picardo). She is almost killed by Quist, so her shrink Dr. George Waggner (Patrick Macnee) suggests she go to a retreat where he sends some of his patients for treatment. So, Karen along with her husband (played by her real-life hubby Christopher Stone in a great performance) to the retreat. Problem is this is where the Quist family lives along with a gang of werewolves.

I really do think this early 80s horror flick is wonderfully lit, excellent use of fog and also has some awesome music from Italian composer Pino Donaggio.

1981 was the year of the werewolf movie as John Landis' AN AMERICAN WEREWOLF IN LONDON (which is generally held in an even higher regard by most) and WOLFEN came out that same year. Rob Bottin did the effects for this movie and I think only 21 at the time shows how marvellous he was at creating special effects as this was I think the very first on-screen transformation into a werewolf in film history. Now some of the effects in the film have not aged the best, but some stand wonderfully as they did when the film was first released.

There are also some cameos in the film such as Dante's old boss Roger Corman, Famous Monster magazine founder Forrest J. Ackerman and future horror director Mick Garris. Also has quite a great cast including Dennis Dugan, Kevin McCarthy, John Carradine and Slim Pickens to name a few.

So, if you are a werewolf fan, enjoy some humour mixed in with your horror and like the old ways horror flicks were made with effects I would highly suggest watching this film. Sadly, followed by an endless parade of bad sequels.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32228,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tremors
Podrhtavanje
programme.desc:
Tremors: Directed by Ron Underwood. With Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross. Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100814/","name":"Tremors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNjkwMzIyMjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDI2NTU5ODYx._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911542/","name":"Fred Ward"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141617/","name":"Finn Carter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033220/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651256/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934093/","name":"S.S. Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534681/","name":"Brent Maddock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"}],"datePublished":"1990-01-19","description":"Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.","keywords":"desert,monster,giant worm,stranded on rooftop,first part","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100814/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wez-1"},"dateCreated":"2001-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has 'cult classic' written all over it.","reviewBody":"This movie caught me by surprise: I worked in a video store, and one day we got a preview tape of this movie, prior to its video release. I hadn't heard much about it, so I watched it, and was quite surprised at how enjoyable it was. Since then, I have seen the movie about ten more times (at least), and still get a kick out of it.

Tremors is basically a landlocked variation on 'Jaws' and those 1950s giant bug movies: the isolated town of Perfection, Nevada (population 16), finds itself under seige by four monstrous, subterranean wormlike creatures, that hunt by sensing vibrations in the ground. The plot revolves around the townspeople trying to outwit and escape the creatures (dubbed 'Graboids'), which are tearing the town out from under them.

What really makes the movie work is the characters: all of them come across as real people trapped in an insane situation, and all have a lot of charisma, even though the film doesn't have tons of character development. Kevin Bacon and Fred Ward are a hoot as a pair of low-rent handymen who become reluctant heroes. The byplay between the two is a lot of fun.

Usually movies like this revolve around stupid people doing stupid things, just to raise the body count. Tremors is different: the characters react believably, and do smart things to try and escape and/or kill the Graboids. The creatures too are also fairly smart, and are not just mindless eating machines with no brains.

Given its premise, Tremors is not a gory or violent film (although it has a couple of minor gross bits), and has a very good sense of humor. The film-makers are aware of their far-fetched premise (a couple of key questions go unanswered), but they treat it with respect and a certain amount of affection.

Tremors didn't have much life in theaters, but has become something of a 'Midnight Movie' on home video, with definite cult possibilities. Check it out, and don't be surprised if you end up buying it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
The Hills Have Eyes: Directed by Alexandre Aja. With Maxime Giffard, Michael Bailey Smith, Tom Bower, Ted Levine. A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454841/","name":"The Hills Have Eyes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTg5MzEyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDUyMzIzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505971/","name":"Ted Levine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000599/","name":"Kathleen Quinlan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126004/","name":"Dan Byrd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0014960/","name":"Alexandre Aja"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013899/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0014960/","name":"Alexandre Aja"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505183/","name":"Grégory Levasseur"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hills Have Eyes (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2750611737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZkMzAwNDAtMjM2My00OTZlLTgzMDktZjdkN2NkYzkyYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZkMzAwNDAtMjM2My00OTZlLTgzMDktZjdkN2NkYzkyYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"2006-04-19","description":"A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.","keywords":"murder of family,deformity,rape,murder spree,graphic violence","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454841/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HarryWarden"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary and intense! A remake that beats the original!","reviewBody":"We've seen dozens of remakes in the past several years: Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The Ring, Dawn of the Dead, The Fog. None could hold a candle next to the original films.

Could it be? After all this time, do we finally found a remake that's actually superior? You're damn right! The Hills Have Eyes is not at all like the other remakes in this ungodly trend. It's not a cheap cash-in. It's a movie made with respect by horror filmmakers for horror fans.

Sure, it has its share of problems: There are too many cheesy false scares, they added a corny patriotic subtext, and it sticks so close to the original that fans will find little in the way of surprises. But it's a leaner, meaner animal than Wes Craven's original film. The characters are more believable, the mutants are scarier, and the whole thing is incredibly visceral! This is the first studio horror film in years that I've liked...mainly because it doesn't feel like a studio horror film.

Funny side note: A girl next to me in the theater was silently weeping through the last half of the movie. Guess it made an impression.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

McElroy"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wrong Turn 5: Bloodlines","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1812898841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjFmZWJhNTctMWFmNC00MTk3LWJjZTUtMzliYjg3ZWUxODVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjFmZWJhNTctMWFmNC00MTk3LWJjZTUtMzliYjg3ZWUxODVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"TV Spot: Can't Turn"},"datePublished":"2013-02-22","description":"A group of college students, on a trip to the Mountain Man Festival on Halloween in West Virginia, encounter a clan of cannibals.","keywords":"topless female nudity,cannibal,rape,no survivors,female nudity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2375779/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"iansmom99"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"(Puke)","reviewBody":"Declan O'Brien has pretty much destroyed the heart pumping, terrifying Wrong Turn franchise with his absurd sequels, WT3 is an exception though. First thing that's wrong with this is that someone gets slaughtered within in the first five minutes. Where is the build up of suspense or story development? The acting is obscene. The only decent performance is Camilla Arfwedson as 'Sheriff Angela'. However the gore/death moments are the same cheesy nonsense from the rest of O' Brien's sequels. I was honestly laughing through a lot of the movie. There is no horror. No suspense. No memorable performances or moments. Just another lame slasher flick. Stop producing sequels. How in the hell is this supposed to be respectable horror?!??","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19071,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pogrešno skretanje 5: Krvne veze
programme.desc: Trojica opasnih kanibala beži iz sanatorijuma uz pomoć serijskog ubice Mejnarda (Dag Bredli) s kojim započnu seriju ubistava u Zapadnoj Virdžiniji. Istovremeno, pet prijatelja Bili (Sajmon Ginti),... Trojica opasnih kanibala beži iz sanatorijuma uz pomoć serijskog ubice Mejnarda (Dag Bredli) s kojim započnu seriju ubistava u Zapadnoj Virdžiniji. Istovremeno, pet prijatelja Bili (Sajmon Ginti), njegova devojka Kruz (Ejmi Lenoks), Lita (Roksen Mek Ki), njen dečko Gas (Pol Lubke) i Džulian (Oliver Hoare) planiraju putovanje za Noć veštica, a cilj je festival u Zapadnoj Virdžiniji. Na putu do tamo skoro pregaze Mejnarda koji ih pokuša ubiti. Ekipa deluje u samoobrani i ubije ga, a stiže i šerif koji je odlučan privesti ih u stanicu. Međutim, u tom trenutku stižu kanibali.

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
Brda imaju oči
programme.desc:
The Hills Have Eyes: Directed by Alexandre Aja. With Maxime Giffard, Michael Bailey Smith, Tom Bower, Ted Levine. A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454841/","name":"The Hills Have Eyes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTg5MzEyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDUyMzIzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505971/","name":"Ted Levine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000599/","name":"Kathleen Quinlan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126004/","name":"Dan Byrd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0014960/","name":"Alexandre Aja"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013899/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0014960/","name":"Alexandre Aja"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505183/","name":"Grégory Levasseur"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hills Have Eyes (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2750611737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZkMzAwNDAtMjM2My00OTZlLTgzMDktZjdkN2NkYzkyYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZkMzAwNDAtMjM2My00OTZlLTgzMDktZjdkN2NkYzkyYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"2006-04-19","description":"A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.","keywords":"murder of family,deformity,rape,murder spree,graphic violence","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454841/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"HarryWarden"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary and intense! A remake that beats the original!","reviewBody":"We've seen dozens of remakes in the past several years: Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The Ring, Dawn of the Dead, The Fog. None could hold a candle next to the original films.

Could it be? After all this time, do we finally found a remake that's actually superior? You're damn right! The Hills Have Eyes is not at all like the other remakes in this ungodly trend. It's not a cheap cash-in. It's a movie made with respect by horror filmmakers for horror fans.

Sure, it has its share of problems: There are too many cheesy false scares, they added a corny patriotic subtext, and it sticks so close to the original that fans will find little in the way of surprises. But it's a leaner, meaner animal than Wes Craven's original film. The characters are more believable, the mutants are scarier, and the whole thing is incredibly visceral! This is the first studio horror film in years that I've liked...mainly because it doesn't feel like a studio horror film.

Funny side note: A girl next to me in the theater was silently weeping through the last half of the movie. Guess it made an impression.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454841/","name":"The Hills Have Eyes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTg5MzEyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDUyMzIzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505971/","name":"Ted Levine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000599/","name":"Kathleen Quinlan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126004/","name":"Dan Byrd"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0014960/","name":"Alexandre Aja"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013899/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174362/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0014960/","name":"Alexandre Aja","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505183/","name":"Grégory Levasseur"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hills Have Eyes (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2750611737","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZkMzAwNDAtMjM2My00OTZlLTgzMDktZjdkN2NkYzkyYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTZkMzAwNDAtMjM2My00OTZlLTgzMDktZjdkN2NkYzkyYWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment","datePublished":"2006-04-19","description":"A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.","keywords":"murder of family,deformity,rape,murder spree,graphic violence","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454841/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"HarryWarden","dateCreated":"2006-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary and intense! A remake that beats the original!","reviewBody":"We've seen dozens of remakes in the past several years: Texas Chainsaw Massacre, The Ring, Dawn of the Dead, The Fog. None could hold a candle next to the original films.

Could it be? After all this time, do we finally found a remake that's actually superior? You're damn right! The Hills Have Eyes is not at all like the other remakes in this ungodly trend. It's not a cheap cash-in. It's a movie made with respect by horror filmmakers for horror fans.

Sure, it has its share of problems: There are too many cheesy false scares, they added a corny patriotic subtext, and it sticks so close to the original that fans will find little in the way of surprises. But it's a leaner, meaner animal than Wes Craven's original film. The characters are more believable, the mutants are scarier, and the whole thing is incredibly visceral! This is the first studio horror film in years that I've liked...mainly because it doesn't feel like a studio horror film.

Funny side note: A girl next to me in the theater was silently weeping through the last half of the movie. Guess it made an impression.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"duration":"PT1H47M"</script><metacontent="

legend,secret passage","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103919/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"brandonsites1981"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"* * * out of 4.","reviewBody":"College student (Virginia Madsen) decides to write a paper on a slave (Tony Todd) who was killed for simply being in love with a white woman. Legend has it if you call out his name several times, he will appear and kill you to avenge his death. Naturally Madsen is disbelieving of this, but Todd starts butchering off all of her friends and framing her in order to make her believe. 

This film is so intense and frightening, that when I first saw this on home video with all of the lights on, I actually had to call my mother and get her to come over and comfort me, because this film scared me to death. Tony Todd is perfect in a menacing performance as the villain and Virginia Madsen makes the perfect victim capturing the right balance between terror and disbelief. The myths and legends behind the film are so complex and so fascinating that this film could have gone on for at least another hour and not be one bit overlong. There is plenty of characterization and atmosphere and the settings for the film are very well chosen. However, working somewhat against the film are some of the supporting actors, poor special effects, and an ultra gimmickey ending that feels as though it belongs in another film given the tone and subject matter of this film.

Rated R; Graphic Violence, Profanity, and Brief Nudity."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73893,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczNTA2MzAzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTkzMzc2._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0022161/","name":"Daniella Craven"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186617/","name":"Jonathan Craven"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Hills Have Eyes 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi378405145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzEzYTZkNzYtMmMwYS00NmExLWJjMjEtMzgzYmUwN2IxMjdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzEzYTZkNzYtMmMwYS00NmExLWJjMjEtMzgzYmUwN2IxMjdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Atomic"},"datePublished":"2007-05-16","description":"A group of National Guard trainees find themselves battling against a vicious group of mutants on their last day of training in the desert.","keywords":"rape,rape and revenge,desert,revenge,napolon bonaparte character","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0800069/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DICK STEEL"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Nutshell Review: The Hills Have Eyes II","reviewBody":"I had actually liked the remake of Wes Craven's Hills Have Eyes, which was shown here last year. Directed by Alxandre Aja, it was top notch violence and gore which actually sent a chill, because the victims were an innocent family out for a holiday, and to see them getting systematically deeper into trouble, somehow makes it rather horrific to sit through.

While its predecessor was shown here with cuts, The Hills Have Eyes II is shown here in its full gory glory. However you wonder, just where did all the blood and gore had gone. Written by father and son team Wes and Jonathan Craven, the follow up movie (also a remake of the sequel to the original) seemed to be lacking in flavour and spirit. Sure the mutants are back, but there's very little space given to set them up, or enough time for you to identify and distinguish one from the other.

Did director Martin Weisz opt to play it safe? There's tension built, but nothing too riveting. The narrative is simple and straightforward, without much thought into trying to capture the X-factor why the original had worked somehow. Attempting to shock just for shock's sake, the movie opens with the birth of a child, in the most un-Discovery Channel manner, before introducing us to the victims, I mean, characters, and a short scene to link the events from its predecessor.

Again the military's dirty hands are in this one. Gone are the family, and in comes a small squad of National Guard trainees. It's soldiers versus A-bomb mutants, so the numbers come in handy to build up the body count. But in fact, none of them died in any creative manner. It's the usual hack jobs, and more uninterestingly, through the use of their carbines. Boring, and I guess too many movies outdoing one another in the creative death department, has taken its toil on this one, where simpleness and sure death like falling from great heights without the camera flinching, go unappreciated. Truth is, you know that it's a camera trick, and boy, are there a number of recognizable indoor shots for this outdoor movie, that makes it look cheap.

By the time it takes for these rookie soldiers to complete their training to the dark side and become cold killers (fighting for their own survival), you'll be more than in a hurry to head for the exit. To enjoy this movie, the usual leave your brains at the door cliché applies. Just make sure someone doesn't take a real machete and help you put it there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":61676,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

An inheritance leads a young man and his friends to an abandoned resort inhabited by two sketchy caretakers and a clan of mutant cannibals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3612032/","name":"Wrong Turn 6: Last Resort","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjdhN2Q0YWItYThhZi00NDAzLWFlMjItZTg2MGMyM2Y4MTlmL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5181790/","name":"Anthony Ilott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1587983/","name":"Chris Jarvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5032019/","name":"Aqueela Zoll"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2274197/","name":"Valeri Milev"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0940924/","name":"Frank H. Woodward"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wrong Turn 6: Last Resort","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi15314713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWU4YjdmNzQtNjI0OC00MTcxLTk0MjEtOWFiYzE4OThlYjZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWU4YjdmNzQtNjI0OC00MTcxLTk0MjEtOWFiYzE4OThlYjZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for Wrong Turn 6: Last Resort"},"datePublished":"2014-10-13","description":"An inheritance leads a young man and his friends to an abandoned resort inhabited by two sketchy caretakers and a clan of mutant cannibals.","keywords":"female nudity,sex scene,sequel,three finger character,cleavage","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3612032/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Michael_Elliott"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Series Hits a New Low","reviewBody":"Wrong Turn 6 (2014)

* (out of 4)

The latest and so far worst in the series has Danny (Anthony Ilott) and six of his friends driving down south so that he can try and figure out about his past. Danny, an orphan, knows very little about his past but he receives word that he has "family" but they turn out to be the mutants from the five previous films.

WRONG TURN 6 is a really bad movie on so many levels that it's almost hard to believe that it could be worse than the third film. There are so many awful and annoying things about this movie it's a wonder that this here simply doesn't end the series. But, then again, when did quality ever determine how many sequels a series gets? 

It's clear that the filmmakers wanted to take the series into a new direction but the "idea" behind this film is just as awful as the ideas behind the sixth film in the HALLOWEEN franchise. Lets see....where do we start? We can start with the screenplay, which is just one bad cliché after another as we get a boring plot dealing with the man being pulled into his "family" in hopes that they can continue in the future, which really makes no sense when you see that there are plenty of males and females already in the family so breeding isn't really an issue. The characters in the film are all incredibly boring and there's not a single one of them that is interesting. The performances aren't too bad but even the likes of Brando, Newman and Foster wouldn't have been able to do anything with this story.

The CGI gore effects are pretty bad and the kills aren't at all creative with most of them just alternate versions of stuff we have seen previously. The film does goes into overdrive when it comes to nudity with four different actresses taking off their clothes and there's some pretty weird and kinky sexual stuff going on. As for our three main killers, they're pretty much wasted here and without a doubt this is the most boring use of them in the series. Their make-up is also extremely bad. WRONG TURN 6 is without question the worst in the series and lets hope if they decide to continue they get back on track."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.2},"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: Zakon i nered. U njujorškoj policijskoj postaji u Brooklynu svaki dan je poseban, svaki je drugačiji i u pravilu prilično kaotičan. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

credits.actor: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones, Christina Hendricks, Michael Gladis, Rosemarie DeWitt, Talia Balsam

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler
Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy, Zach McGowan, Toby Schmitz, Clara Paget, Louise Barnes

programme.title: Opušteno
programme.desc: Reditelj Zander Leman i izvršni producent Džejson Rajtman (reditelj filmova "U vazduhu" i "Džuno") predstavljaju nam komediju "Opušteno", nominovanu za nagradu Zlatni globus, koja istražuje smešnu i... Reditelj Zander Leman i izvršni producent Džejson Rajtman (reditelj filmova "U vazduhu" i "Džuno") predstavljaju nam komediju "Opušteno", nominovanu za nagradu Zlatni globus, koja istražuje smešnu i čudnu dinamiku modernih porodica i odnosa unutar njih. Nedavno razvedena Valerija i njena 16-godišnja ćerka Lora se useljavaju kod Valerijinog brata Aleksa, večitog neženje i stručnjaka za usputne veze. Valerija i Aleks zajedno krstare kroz ludi svet izlazaka usput odgajajući njenu ćerku tinejdžerku.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Goldbergovi
programme.desc: Jednom ne tako davno i ne tako daleko 11-godišnji Adam Goldberg (Sean Giambrone) video-kamerom svojih roditelja dokumentira život na periferiji 1980-ih godina. Pratimo 3. sezonu humoristične serije za sve uzraste o bučnoj, toploj i pomalo neprilagođenoj obitelji u 80-ima. Pripovjedač nam govori o svojem životu s nametljivom majkom, razdražljivim ocem, buntovnom starijom sestrom, prenapetim starijim bratom i djedom zavodnikom. Goldbergovi su obožavatelji videorekordera, glazbenih kompilacija i elastana! Najmlađi sin Adam (Sean Giambrone), štreber opsjednut filmovima, i dalje se pokušava nositi sa životom školarca te dokumentira urnebesne i neugodne ispade svoje živopisne obitelji. Majka Beverly (Wendi McLendon-Covey) u punoj je formi kad se petlja u tuđe živote, nalazi ljudima partnere i zasljepljuje sve oko sebe, dok tata Murray (Jeff Garlin) odgaja djecu iz udobnog naslonjača na kojem sjedi samo u gaćama. Najstarije dijete Erica (Hayley Orrantia) napokon će se odvojiti od obitelji i otići na fakultet. Barry (Troy Gentile), srednje dijete, obuzet je osjećajima, kao i pisanjem domišljatih stihova te suosjeća s prijateljem Geoffom Schwartzom (Sam Lerner) kad njihove starije djevojke odu studirati. Najstariji je član obitelji omiljeni djed Al Solomon (George Segal), razuzdani član klana, besramni zavodnik koji uživa u trenucima s unucima gotovo jednako kao i u tjednim masažama. U ovoj sezoni djeca će se morati odupirati zagrljajima i pusicama dok pokušavaju odrasti u obitelji Goldberg.

credits.actor: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones, Christina Hendricks, Michael Gladis, Rosemarie DeWitt, Talia Balsam

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler
Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy, Zach McGowan, Toby Schmitz, Clara Paget, Louise Barnes

programme.title: Opušteno
programme.desc: Reditelj Zander Leman i izvršni producent Džejson Rajtman (reditelj filmova "U vazduhu" i "Džuno") predstavljaju nam komediju "Opušteno", nominovanu za nagradu Zlatni globus, koja istražuje smešnu i... Reditelj Zander Leman i izvršni producent Džejson Rajtman (reditelj filmova "U vazduhu" i "Džuno") predstavljaju nam komediju "Opušteno", nominovanu za nagradu Zlatni globus, koja istražuje smešnu i čudnu dinamiku modernih porodica i odnosa unutar njih. Nedavno razvedena Valerija i njena 16-godišnja ćerka Lora se useljavaju kod Valerijinog brata Aleksa, večitog neženje i stručnjaka za usputne veze. Valerija i Aleks zajedno krstare kroz ludi svet izlazaka usput odgajajući njenu ćerku tinejdžerku.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: Zakon i nered. U njujorškoj policijskoj postaji u Brooklynu svaki dan je poseban, svaki je drugačiji i u pravilu prilično kaotičan. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Goldbergovi
programme.desc: Jednom ne tako davno i ne tako daleko 11-godišnji Adam Goldberg (Sean Giambrone) video-kamerom svojih roditelja dokumentira život na periferiji 1980-ih godina. Pratimo 3. sezonu humoristične serije za sve uzraste o bučnoj, toploj i pomalo neprilagođenoj obitelji u 80-ima. Pripovjedač nam govori o svojem životu s nametljivom majkom, razdražljivim ocem, buntovnom starijom sestrom, prenapetim starijim bratom i djedom zavodnikom. Goldbergovi su obožavatelji videorekordera, glazbenih kompilacija i elastana! Najmlađi sin Adam (Sean Giambrone), štreber opsjednut filmovima, i dalje se pokušava nositi sa životom školarca te dokumentira urnebesne i neugodne ispade svoje živopisne obitelji. Majka Beverly (Wendi McLendon-Covey) u punoj je formi kad se petlja u tuđe živote, nalazi ljudima partnere i zasljepljuje sve oko sebe, dok tata Murray (Jeff Garlin) odgaja djecu iz udobnog naslonjača na kojem sjedi samo u gaćama. Najstarije dijete Erica (Hayley Orrantia) napokon će se odvojiti od obitelji i otići na fakultet. Barry (Troy Gentile), srednje dijete, obuzet je osjećajima, kao i pisanjem domišljatih stihova te suosjeća s prijateljem Geoffom Schwartzom (Sam Lerner) kad njihove starije djevojke odu studirati. Najstariji je član obitelji omiljeni djed Al Solomon (George Segal), razuzdani član klana, besramni zavodnik koji uživa u trenucima s unucima gotovo jednako kao i u tjednim masažama. U ovoj sezoni djeca će se morati odupirati zagrljajima i pusicama dok pokušavaju odrasti u obitelji Goldberg.

credits.actor: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones, Christina Hendricks, Michael Gladis, Rosemarie DeWitt, Talia Balsam
